title: LoL Client Accept match Bug
body:
So I played a couple matches today, climbed to gold 1 promos, the match found thing pops up and i click accept, after clicking accept i load into champ select but cannot see Champions, Roles or anything because the match found window is still on my screen. After being forced to dodge because i am unable to even pick a champion my first promos game counts as a loss. I play my second promos game and secure an easy win, making me 1-1 in promos, and then the same bug that happened the first time comes up AGAIN and makes me lose my promos??? I have never encountered this bug ever before and now i am down LP with my tilt level through the roof.

FIx this bug and gimme back my LP pls.

And nerf AP malphite again. (that Nerf you already did doesn't stop him from one shotting carries ?????? who would of thought..??)

replies.body: Literally just came here to rage about this. I've lost 12 LP and been made to wait a fucking dodge timer because of this shit. Fix the client please it's infuriating.

I keep getting this too and it's bloody annoying!! 

The most recent time I had it I force quit the client an relaunched it before champ select had ended and it actually put me into champ select properly, but I had 5 secs left to try pick a champ/runes....
Yeah this glitch just happened to me even when i left the lobby it was still there only fix is to just quit the client....{{champion:245}}

I have had this exact same glitch during my promos as well. Very frustrating as i was forced to leave which caused me to lose one of the 3 games. Here is a picture. PLEASE FIX THIS RIOT
